It can be a lot to learn, starting at level 1 with no perks is an experience I would liken to the early days of League of Legends with no runes, but you'll get there. The Public DBD discord is a good place to find people who will help you learn.

Killers are OP at the time I'm writing this, I get some 4-kill games with 1 tier 1 perk and not really knowing what I'm doing. It's really fun though.

Also, I would advise trying to learn etiquette for this game. If you demolish a team as a killer, consider letting that 4th person go, just to be nice. And if you stomp a killer as a squad, let them get a few free hits in for the points.

As of right now ~ DO NOT play this game unless you have a group of friends!!! It's miserable otherwise!!!! The fun..the magic is gone for this game after the recent update. I cannot recommend this game at all in its current broken state. Killers are OP and survivors have been gutted. It gets boring having 4k's handed to you as killer and on survivor side everyone is more scared than ever before....

I only speak for SoloQ cuz its all I care about and spend most of my time. I do have a SWF group but prefer playing alone.
You go on chases to get downed... only to see teammates crouched in a corner or hiding in the basement. Whoever gets hooked first gets camped. Gens are agonizingly slowwww. Kindred should've been basekit for Solo. Chases are way shorter now, but also depends on map.... still...meh. I loved this game and would log in often, but now I can't bring myself to play at all! Zero fun on both sides for me. I thought it had a decent balance before but now its too easy as killer and too hard for survivor for all the wrong reasons. Forced prestige and actually became even more grindy! This game took a massive L

Literally unplayable for anyone trying the game for the first time, and incredibly frustrating for long time players. This game is only good if you have three or four friends to play a private game, playing online and grinding away for mostly useless perks that are out shinned by VERY Overpowered perks is a massive waste of time, rather than rebalancing the devs are more concerned over merchandise, liscensing deals, $15 cosmetics, and dating simulators. Don't buy this game unless it's for a party, huge waste of money.

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single farther to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So I decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories. h
good

I enjoy playing this game as both killer or survivor, the perk system is interesting and leaves a lot of room for messing around, and looping is so fucking fun, god I love mindgames. You can play as 1 of the 4 survivors or 
 the killer on your own, however the matchmaking is kinda weird, where you'll probably play against or with either godlike survivors or newer survivors, which supposedly depends on how many people you sacrifice, or whether or not you escape, but this can lead to a lot of toxic people either blaming you or calling you trash because you're sweaty. There's been a lot of hackers due to ol' reliable easy anticheat, but I've yet to encounter them and you probably won't either. I personally enjoy playing with friends more, and if you're like me, you'll be pleased to know that custom matches allow you to use every perk you want without needing to unlock them, tho you will need to unlock killers. If you have money to spare and are interested check it out.

wenn du gerne Hass Kommentare auf dein steam Profil Farmen willst oder vielleicht Leute sehen willst die im End Game Chat ein Nervenzusammenbruch bekommen und dir die schuld daran geben dann ist das Game für dich genau richtig als Killer Main bekommt man dann auch die extra Ladung salz ab nach jeden Game egal wie fair du gespielt hast hier ein paar positive Sachen und negative über DBD

Positiv : 
End Game Chat Blocker 

ein Streamer Mode der nicht in der Lobby funktioniert 

Lustige Profil namen  

Große Auswahl an verschiedene Killer/survs 

Preset Layouts zum einstellen 

endlose Auswahl an Perks/Addons 

etwas das positiv aber auch negativ ist das die Devs sehr hart daran arbeiten neuen Content zu bringen, dafür 
das fixen von Problemen zu kurz kommt 

Viele Verschiedene Events 

ich könnte noch einiges mehr nennen aber ich will hier kein buch schreiben

Negativ : 
das MMR System funktioniert nicht so wirklich was ich denke zurückzuführen ist auf die unterschiedliche Spieler Anzahl an Killer/surv was für mich persönlich kein problem ist 

etwas längere Queue Zeiten (zurzeit bei Killer) was aber auch von mein MMR abhängen kann

was ich sehr ungerne anspreche sind Cheaters die dich Hostage halten und dich Forcen zu Disconnecten und dich damit in ein Stackenden zeit bedingten Ban fürs Match Making zwingt oder sie halten dich 2 stunden lang im Game fest da das Game aus irgendeinen Grund nicht im End Game Collaps zu ende geht und du damit Stuck bist 

Viele Bugs die einfach random auftauchen und ab und zu sehr lange nicht gefixed werden 

eine Community die extrem Toxic ist egal ob in Game oder den Devs gegenüber auf Twitter 
ich habe noch nie ein spiel gesehen das soviel Entitled Spieler hat wie DBD 

zum ende noch ein paar Sachen : 

Leute die sich nicht sicher sind ob sie sich DBD holen oder nicht ich kann es ganz klar empfehlen anfangs kann es ein ganz schön überwältigen aber Youtube & Twitch ist voll mit Guides die ein weiter helfen mit was man starten sollte ich würde es nicht einfach ohne Hilfe von Guides anfangen da der Grind sehr sehr hart ist informiere dich lieber oder du wirst sehr viel zeit verschwenden ich selber habe das Game 4 Jahre auf Twitch verfolgt Bevor ich es mir geholt habe was ein extremer vorteil war und noch eine Sache auch wenn es viele toxic Leute gibt man kann den Chat einfach ausblenden aber es gibt auch mehr als genug nette Leute die dich Adden und mit dir zusammen zocken DBD ist einfach ein einzigartiges Game auch wenn einige Games versuchen es zu kopieren wird es immer im Vordergrund stehen (meiner Meinung nach)
